mxCell.value: Production table with data flagged for removal.
Fraction flagged to remove on production and move to history on publishing database.
This flow is necessary if we use the strategy to mark what has been removed, but wait for the next synchronization with the intersection and then remove all marked rows.
Choose one strategy to define this operation
Before start the process, the script makes one backup.
Some fractions are less than 6.25 ha. If we calculate the areas of these fractions, some resources will be filtered out of the publication data. How shall we proceed?

deter_table: current production data;
deter_history: historical data stored after each cleaning by the PRODES mask;

The history table receives data filtered by date
Fractions to move to the history table
The history table receives data from intersections result

To calculate the areas for the polygon fractions, we must consider that the fractions were cut in production before synchronization, therefore, the original alerts no longer exist. To obtain the correct areas, we will perform the intersections by municipalities and conservation units again. We must validate this step.
Before start the process, the script makes one backup.
